casebody.data:
Allstate Insurance Company v. Kristina DeCapua et al. Hartford Accident and Indemnity Company v. Kristina DeCapua (10052)

Foti, Landau and Heiman, Js.

Argued December 3 decision released December 17, 1991 Barry N. Silver, with whom, on the brief, was Alan E. Silver, for the appellant (named defendant). Carla Ottaviano, for the appellee (plaintiff in the second case). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
